name: reaper-cloth
effect: Held by Dusclops: Evolves the holder into Dusknoir when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Dusclops: Holder evolves into Dusknoir.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
